page.title: 07Shopping Survey in Clive
page.content: Residents of Clive were asked to answer questions about where they went to do their shopping. Many people, especially the older residents, said they shopped for their daily needs such as bread , fruit and vegetables, at the village shop in Clive. Some older people shopped exclusively at this shop. Many people said they went to large supermarkets in Shrewsbury or Whitchurch for items of food that would keep for a longer time. Other people shopped regularly in Wem for groceries. Furniture and clothes were not bought very often but if they were, it was from small stores in Wem or larger stores in Shrewsbury or Telford or even from cities as far away as Chester, Wolverhampton or Birmingham. Everybody appreciated the village shop as it was so convenient although it was more expensive.
